title: your shop reroll?
body:
i was wondering if we are getting a reroll 

i did receive a reroll on the past one and got something better 

this shop is the most disappointing for me so far as i got 1 skin for champ that i play rn and its a 520 skin that has 30 off so its a 364 skin  and since i must charge 5 dollars to buy it anyway there is not that much of a deal with it

at least give rerolls to people who didnt bought any skins from the shop yet 

 and thanks

replies.body: Players were able to get the previous your shop rerolled due to a very particular bug that affected everyone. We aren't able to refresh those skins due to not wanting any of them, unfortunately.
there will be no reroll, I'm sorry, there was a bug with YourShop, so they needed to relaunch it and everyone lost his old shop and got it replaced.
